oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Service-oriented communications in optical networks using virtual switching
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ZHENG, SQ
GUMASTE, ASHWIN
WANG, JIANPING
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: optical fibre networks
optical switches

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, the authors focus on wide-area wired networks, especially the Internet. The performance of such a network is mainly determined by the capacity (bandwidth) of its links, and the latency of transmitted data encountered at intermediate nodes. These nodes are referred to as switching nodes, or simply switches.
